patthana16.44:1.1_0: Ajjhattaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nabahiddhā nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.44:1.1_1: Bahiddhā hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naajjhatto nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.44:2.1_0: Ajjhattaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nabahiddhā nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.44:2.1_1: Bahiddhā nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naajjhatto nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
